tool_description: Maps the current electrical grid topology by analyzing equipment status, switch positions, and circuit breaker states to create network connectivity model.

substation_ids.description: List of substation identifiers to include in topology

update_mode.description: Topology update mode: real-time or snapshot

topology_depth.description: Network depth levels to include (1 to 5)

error_messages: Invalid substation ID: One or more substation IDs not found in system database.
Equipment status format error: Each entry must contain 4 comma-separated values.
Voltage level out of range: Voltage levels must be positive numbers in kV.
Invalid update mode: Use either 'real-time' or 'snapshot'.
Topology depth out of range: Must be between 1 and 5.
Inconsistent equipment data: Equipment status contains contradictory information.
usage: Provide substation_ids, equipment_status, and voltage_levels arrays. Optionally configure update_mode, transformer/capacitor inclusion, and topology_depth for customized mapping.

network_nodes.description: List of network nodes (buses) in the topology

islanded_sections.description: Isolated network sections not connected to main grid

total_equipment.description: Total number of equipment items in topology

connectivity_status.description: Overall network connectivity: fully-connected, partially-connected, fragmented
